AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dark Templar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a part of the higher echelons of the dark god's priesthood. Skilled with blades as much as [Pawn_pronoun] is with [Pawn_possessive] wits, [Pawn_pronoun] is as equally charismatic as [Pawn_pronoun] is dangerous. However, menial labour and caretaking is beneath [Pawn_objective], as befitting [Pawn_objective] elite status.
